txt.en:
[placeholder],

I'm waiting for you in the Bree Jail, if you are ready to learn more about the fine art of brawling. You had better be, for my time is valuable: I could be spending it drinking... or fighting... or both at the same time!

Brom Hawksbeard

'There you are. Finally. I was beginning to get somewhat bored, and when I get bored... folk get hurt! Only them as deserve it, of course.\n\n'Like those who make me wait too long for something, Brawler!'
You received a letter from Brom Hawksbeard, the Brawler trainer in Bree-town, asking to see you.
Bring the letter to Brom Hawksbeard in Bree Jail
Brom Hawksbeard sent you a letter requesting that you visit him in the Bree Jail.\n\nDeliver the letter to Brom. He can be found in the Bree Jail.
